title: Game Freezing, unable to close
body: I play with friends and family, and we have all experienced the issue since urf, on multiple different computers. The game will freeze, and effectively crash as it cannot unfreeze. I then cannot close the game from the menu bar, nor can I close it via task manager as I cannot minimize LoL to display the task manager, always forcing a computer restart.

replies.body: However this is just a bypass, the problem remains. :/
I've always used an alternate desktop method. Didn't know about the other one. (>_>)
You guys got a rx 5700 or 5700xt? Read somewhere that it could be a gpu driver problem.
Anyone hear a response from riot about this?
Hmm, interesting, I thought something was wrong with my pc but I guess not.

{{champion:84}} "Balanced" Akali

I have the same problem. One time it hapend on my ranked game. I lost it of course because enemy fizz was 4 level ahead, just get one-shot under tower. give me my lp back >.<
